annoucement: *Please fill out all fields. (If a field is blank, please fill in '-' instead)

title.title: Title
title.canSelectBaan: Would you like to participate in Freshers' Fair grouping activity?

uploadModal.title: Edit Image
uploadModal.desc: Use a photo that clearly sees your face. | Do not apply image filters. | Maximum file size is 4 MB.

vaccineModal.title: Upload QR Code
vaccineModal.desc: Use the QR Code from Digital Health Pass category in Mor Prompt (หมอพร้อม) app. | Enable Personal information in Digital Health Pass Tab | Select EU Digital COVID Certificate. | Select type as Vaccination Status. | Maximum file size is 4 MB.

error.invalidMime: The image must be in PNG or JPEG format.
error.noQrCode: Unable to recognize EU DCC Certificate QR Code in this image.
error.invalidQrCode: The QR Code is invalid or already used. Please try again.
error.notAllowUpload: You are not allowed to upload in this period
error.unknownError: Unknown error occurred. Please try again.
error.vaccineAlreadyApproved: This QR has already been used.
error.uploadImageFailed: Failed to upload image. Please try again
error.updateProfileFailed: Failed to update profile. Please try again

confirmModal.title: Are you sure you want to confirm?
